Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.gameComponents.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class is the Worker associated to the player during a match

    • initializePos

      public boolean initializePos​(Box requestedBox, Board board)
      This method is recall to initialize the position of a worker in the Board
      Parameters:
      requestedBox - is the box where the player wants to put the worker
      board - game's board
      Returns:
      a boolean that is true if the worker is set in the requested position
